label: 上司
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: Messengers or other low-ranking monk-functionaries who served either in the offices of a temple cabinet (sangō) or in the chief monk's (bettō) office. Their duties frequently took them to the estates, where they might be involved in tax collection or other routine matters of shōen administration.　[三綱、別当]
